TopicTitle: Just some stuff burning up on re-entry...

Articles.Content:
After discovering that Kerb-Cam has an option to slow down the games speed, I decided to build some crafts made out of a ridiculous amount of parts connected by docking ports... and destroy them!

So... Yeah...

As much as I respect KSP for being a game about discovery and progression rather than mindless destruction, you've got to admit that the fireballs created by huge ships burning up do look pretty amazing;

Music n' stuff in the video description, Thanks.
That was pretty nice, and the music fits it perfectly. Have some rep.
